message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product. I'm excited to discuss the price with you. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer you the product for $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $1100000 for the product. This is the highest I can go while staying within my budget.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still willing to negotiate. Considering the value the product brings, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I counteroffer the product for $1150000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I believe it's still a great deal for you.
I appreciate your counteroffer, Alice. I am willing to consider $1125000 as the final price for the product. This is the most I can afford while still staying within my budget.
